verses.verse: As the deer<WH354> pants<WH6165> for the water<WH4325> brooks,<WH650> so my soul<WH5315> pants<WH6165> after you,<WH430> God.
My soul<WH5315> thirsts<WH6770> for God,<WH430> for the living<WH2416> God.<WH410> When shall I come<WH935> and appear<WH7200> before<WH6440> God?<WH430>
My tears<WH1832> have been my food<WH3899> day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> while they continually<WH3117> ask<WH559> me,<WH430> "Where is your God?"

These things I remember,<WH2142> and pour out<WH8210> my soul<WH5315> within me,<WH5674> how I used to go with the crowd,<WH5519> and led<WH1718> them to the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> with the voice<WH6963> of joy<WH7440> and praise,<WH8426> a multitude<WH1995> keeping a holy day.<WH2287>

Why are you in despair,<WH7817> my soul?<WH5315> Why are you disturbed<WH1993> within me?<WH3176> Hope in God!<WH430> For I shall still praise<WH3034> him for the saving help<WH3444> of his presence.<WH6440>

My God,<WH430> my soul<WH5315> is in despair<WH7817> within me.<WH2142> Therefore I remember you from the land<WH776> of the Jordan,<WH3383> the heights of Hermon,<WH2769> from the hill<WH2022> Mizar.<WH4706>
Deep<WH8415> calls<WH7121> to deep<WH8415> at the noise<WH6963> of your waterfalls.<WH6794> All your waves<WH4867> and your billows<WH1530> have swept over me.<WH5674>
Yahweh<WH3068> will command<WH6680> his loving kindness<WH2617> in the daytime.<WH3119> In the night<WH3915> his song<WH7892> shall be with me:<WH8605> a prayer to the God<WH410> of my life.<WH2416>
I will ask<WH559> God,<WH410> my rock,<WH5553> "Why have you forgotten<WH7911> me?<WH3212> Why do I go mourning<WH6937> because of the oppression<WH3906> of the enemy?<WH341>"
As with a sword<WH7524> in my bones,<WH6106> my adversaries<WH6887> reproach<WH2778> me,<WH3117> while they continually ask<WH559> me,<WH430> "Where is your God?"

Why are you in despair,<WH7817> my soul?<WH5315> Why are you disturbed<WH1993> within me?<WH3176> Hope in God!<WH430> For I shall still praise<WH3034> him,<WH3444> the saving help of my countenance,<WH6440> and my God.<WH430>
